text.note: Mitchell Library, Harpur MS A87-2, p.700.

Last two lines of the poem. The lines that follow, and those on pp. 699, 701, 702, 745 and 746, would seem to be draft revisions of a complete version that has been lost except for these two lines. See H689k, H689l and H689m for these fragments.

l.add: whatWhat indeed are all things, even those

text.l: That seem most solidâ€”Dust and Air at last!
